meanings.definition: A person who looks casually through books or magazines.
meanings.sent1: The browsers at the library enjoy flipping through different magazines.
meanings.sent2: She is a fast reader and a skilled browsers of various novels.
meanings.sent3: The browsers chuckled as they found a hidden joke in the magazine.
meanings.sent4: The browsers in the bookstore were like detectives searching for clues in the pages.
meanings.sent5: The browsers in the bookstore had a keen eye for interesting titles.

meanings.definition: A program with a graphical user interface for displaying HTML files, used to navigate the World Wide Web.
meanings.sent1: My favorite browsers allows me to visit different websites easily.
meanings.sent2: He opened his browsers to search for information on the internet.
meanings.sent3: The browsers on my computer seem to have a mind of their own sometimes.
meanings.sent4: Using the browsers is like having a magic window to explore the internet.
meanings.sent5: The browsers on my phone make it simple to access online content.
